title: Website Development
description: Professional websites designed for trust, clarity, and inquiry conversion.
why_matters: Your website is often the first trust checkpoint. If customers do not understand your value quickly, inquiries are lost before conversation begins.
who_its_for: Ideal for businesses with no website, outdated pages, or low-quality inquiry flow.
what_you_get: Responsive business-ready pages for mobile and desktop
Service-focused content architecture with clear call-to-action flow
SEO-friendly semantic structure and optimized loading
Integrated lead form, click-to-call, and WhatsApp contact entry points
key_benefits: Improved lead quality and conversion intent
Stronger brand presence in local search and social sharing

title: Instagram Growth
description: Monthly growth systems that align social visibility with business outcomes.
why_matters: Without strategic content structure, social activity becomes inconsistent and difficult to convert into real business conversations.
who_its_for: Best for local businesses that post regularly but still struggle with engagement quality or inquiry consistency.
what_you_get: Monthly content planning framework based on your business category
Profile and communication optimization to improve first impression
Performance review rhythm with practical action points
key_benefits: Better profile authority and audience trust
Clearer pathway from social attention to inquiry

title: WhatsApp Automation
description: Lead-response automation that improves speed, structure, and consistency.
why_matters: Delayed replies and scattered follow-up directly reduce conversion. Automation keeps response quality stable even during peak inquiry periods.
who_its_for: Useful for teams handling frequent inbound leads or businesses that want cleaner inquiry management.
what_you_get: Structured welcome and first-response automation setup
Intent-based message routing and lead categorization logic
Follow-up response templates for faster communication
Workflow guidance for team handoff and response consistency
key_benefits: Reduced missed inquiries and manual overhead
Improved conversion continuity across communication stages
